title: Skills
text:
Core Skills & Competencies

Technical & Analytical

Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel, including pivot tables, formulas, and data visualization.

Data analysis and performance tracking for operational metrics.

Experience with QuickBooks and basic accounting tools.

Knowledge of Google Data Analytics and KPI dashboard creation.




Professional & Operational

Strong background in operations management and process optimization.

Skilled in logistics coordination and supply chain efficiency improvement.

Time management and ability to work under pressure.

Experience managing cross-functional teams.

Focus on continuous improvement and operational excellence.




Interpersonal & Leadership

Effective communication and customer service skills.

Leadership in multicultural, fast-paced environments.

Mentoring abilities.

Adaptable .

Results Oriented.

English: Professional / Bilingual

title: Juan Felipe Escobar â€” MBA Portfolio
text:
Juan Felipe Escobar â€” MBA Candidate (UCW)
Operations, Logistics & Customer Service
Education Experience Skills References Contact


With international experience in Canada, the United States, and Colombia as an operations and logistics professional, I have been able to establish a career that is centered on process optimization, service efficiency, and team leadership towards success. My experience relied on critical thinking, strategic planning, and adapting to complex operating conditions. During the last years, I had control over the logistics processes, managed cross-functional teams, and introduced data-driven solutions that reinforced performance and customer satisfaction.
I am currently pursuing a Master of Business Administration at the University of Canada West, and I am deepening my knowledge in the field of supply chain, project management, and business analytics. I am looking to incorporate technology and data intelligence in the operations decisions to achieve sustainable growth and innovation. I am proud of my ability to promote cooperation, the pursuit of excellence, and responsibility in any team that I am in, and make sure that the business goals are realized effectively and in a sustainable way.
Operations Excellence Logistics Digital Transformation Customer Experience
